## Source: ossf-package-analysis (74027deb8f96cb586a9b82484dbb7818ccfbbfdd2147a05fdae660aad4211e53)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'npmrunnode-fetch-test' @ 1337.1.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
